***"What is 'SDCA'?"***

> SDCA is an acronym for 'Strategic Dollar Cost Averaging'.
> 
> I will give you advanced and difficult to understand instructions on what to buy, and how to buy it.
> 
> This will be confusing for beginners, so it is recommended that you stick to ⭐｜Simple Long Term Investing until you've completed the investing masterclass lessons.




***"If SDCA is hard to understand, why are you telling me about it?"***

> I am going to tell you what all of your signal options are before you decide which ones are appropriate to you. 
> 
> I believe this is fair for the beginners, and for the more experienced investors.




***"What do I buy with SDCA?"***

> You will mainly be buying BTC and ETH. 
> 
> However I will also include other high risk / high reward positions in there, these will change over time.




***"Why should I use SDCA when I can just buy my own crypto?"***

> Because you don't know when to buy, or when to sell for the best results.
> 
> We do.




***"How long does SDCA signals last for?"***

> Impossible to know in advance. Possibly Years.




***"What if I already have a portfolio? How can SDCA Signals help me?"***

> Using the principles of aggregated market valuation, you'll be able to make more accurate entry and exit decisions. 




***"Ok, but if I use SDCA, when will I know when to sell?"***

> We will tell you




***"The SDCA Signals look too basic, I need something that is 'more advanced' / 'works faster' / 'has more reward & risk'"***

> No problem, we have plenty of those strategies too. 
> 
> Do more lessons to unlock them.




***"How much will I make following SDCA Signals?"***

> Yeah hold on one moment while I look into my crystal ball.
> 
> Your mind is poisoned by hype marketing bullshit. 
> 
> Gains are impossible to know because everyone buys different assets at different times. Obviously.
> 
> Do you think I have telepathy to know what you're holding, or maybe you think I can summon premonitions of what might happen in the future?
> 
> Grow up. We are professionals here.
> 
> Its known you'll make thousands of percent gains, but no one can know how much you make exactly.




***Where can I find it?:***

> In the ⭐｜SDCA channel




***Want to create your own SDCA portfolio strategy so you know how to invest without me having to hold your hand like a child?***

> Do all the lessons and graduate the INVESTING MASTERCLASS for a complete guide on how to make your own.
